summary: Enables the Forsworn warpaint for use by the player :D
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to roleplay as a Reachman but felt the experience was limited by the fact you couldn't use those sweet sweet warpaints the Forsworn had? Look no further! Now your Reachman character can look even more the part!

Q and A:

Q: What mods do I need for this?
A: None.

Q: Are these for all races/genders?
A: As far as I'm aware (I made this mod for personal use months and months ago) it's for Breton males and females only.

Q: Do they come in only one colour?
A: Nope! They come in all the vanilla colours; purple, green, red, etc.
author: NitroGoose
